title: Clubhouse with Free WiFi, New Cabinetry In Renovated Units, Pool Views
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Surrounded by sprawling\xa0green\xa0lawns and mature trees,\xa0Independence\xa0Green\xa0Apartments is your destination for inspired living.', 'Our one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes offer well-appointed interiors complete with a convenient in-home washer and dryer and ample storage space.', ' Our wooded community provides gorgeous views and the perfect backdrop for a quiet glass of wine on your own private patio.', 'If you prefer to work out before you relax, check out our heated indoor pool in the winter, or our sparkling outdoor pool and sand volleyball court in the summer.', '\xa0   Independence\xa0Green\xa0Apartments has everything you need to unwind, get fit, and live well.', 'Come see why life is better at\xa0Independence\xa0Green\xa0Apartments.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Pool Views', 'Sauna', 'In-Home Washer/Dryer', 'Hardwood Flooring', 'Tennis court', 'Business Center', 'BBQ Area', 'Online Payments Available', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Upgraded Kitchens', 'Walk-in Closets', 'New Cabinetry In Renovated Units', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
